summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account over the month of November 2015. It details significant transfers, including large outgoing funds to various accounts, and provides insights into the financial activities associated with the account.

persons.name: Jj Litchford
persons.context: Jj Litchford is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $20,000,000.00 was made from the account.

events.title: Multiple Transfers
events.description: Several transfers totaling $2,500,000.00 and $150,000.00 were made to other accounts.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing transfer of $5,200,000.00 was made to Morgan Stanley.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $23,000,000.00 was received from another account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook, Quarter B3, St Thomas, 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $578,573,964.81 as of November 1, 2015.
Significant outgoing transfers included $20,000,000.00 and $2,500,000.00 on November 9 and 10, respectively.
The account ended with a balance of $73,431,939.36 as of November 30, 2015.
Interest earned during the period was $7,974.55.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
